Headline: #57 Laramie Temporary Northbound Reroute near Harrison/Cicero
ShortDescription: Northbound 57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Lexington, Cicero, Flournoy, Lavergne and Harrison due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Lexington, Cicero, Flournoy, Lavergne and Harrison due to street blockage near Harrison/Cicero.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Pulaski
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
